content.detailedDescription:
Went to the marfa lights viewing platform between alpine and marfa texas the night of april 3, 2015. cold and windy night with a lot of cloud cover. at around 9:45 began to see coming from north to south, an object in the sky. the object had three white constant lights at the corners forming an equallateral triangle. in the middle of the triangle was a red blinking light

the object flew from north to south with no sounds. it seemed to hover at times then turned west and then eventually went into the cloud deck traveling in a northwesterly direction.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three white unblinking lights in perfect triangle with red blinking dot in center. below cloud deck with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: At about 1235 am april 4th me and my gf were sitting on the beach in hollywood i looked up and noticed an orb yellow orange erratically hovering all together i noticed 4 all doing the same pattern we observed the objects till 210 am i asked several people to look they all thought i was nuts even the police just me and my gf saw the event i also have video from my cell phone
content.summary: Erratic hovering ufos

content.detailedDescription: On my way home at about 1-130am heading east. noticed 3 white lights very bright in triangle shape in night sky ahead of me. thought was a plane at first. as approached closer more lights appeared into a circular shape all white in color with circular shaped lights around. it seemed as if the light on top of the disc shaped thing was brightest of them all. i was blinking my eyes over and over trying to understand what i was seeing it was so close. i kept asking my boyfriend are you seeing what i'm seeing is this real do you see this do you see what i think i am seeing. hovering still for awhile about 20-45 seconds until i pulled into my yard and it lowered down a little bit and then took off west really fast then changed shape to a line with different shaped lights kind of like a plane but there was no noise of a plane heard and no planes around. i felt like it wasn't real life happening i thought i was freaking out but i realized i really was looking at what i thought it was. i felt very scared and fearful. i began shaking when it started to hover down a little bit shortly before taking off. i thought it was going to land or something. it transformed to some different shape but first was triangle then circular like a disc with lights around it and then to a line kinda like a plane. then after going west it turns and flys north over my house i can't see it anymore. i lost vision of the thing once it flew over my house. it was very scary i never saw such a thing in my entire life. it all happened so fast i wish i could have video taped it or took photos. i hope that others saw what i saw. april 1st 2015 at 1-130am located in albuquerque new mexico. attached is a very very similar photo of what i saw. first the triangle except white lights then more came on into a circle shape.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering at drive home once parked jetted off fast. scary.

content.detailedDescription: Same as noted above
content.summary: Several bright orange objects in east sky, making way towards east mountains

content.detailedDescription: I've been with the white haired people. they stood me in front of a mirror. they did not reflect. a small girl child and boy. what i assumed to be parrents spoke to me through telepathic means. the children had white hair too. they were perfect in proportions. all were perfect. they seemed to be out of place. as if they were in disguise. i reflected in the mirror, they did not.Then i came back in to my space,hit hard on the way back, hit hard on reentry. exhausted for two days. wasn't the first time. like falling on your back from a three story building on cement. muscle and bone fatigue.First time was at age 14. and then at 15.Then again at 40. told no one. im 52. the boy i was with at the time we encountered the ufo never spoke again. i would really like to speak with someone about this. i've seen the orange orbs too. how did you know the ship was grey lead color? also had obe experiences. more than one. thank you.
content.summary: I was a kid walking home on a gravel road with a school friend. it was time to get home before dark. he and i stopped on the road, looked to our left and there it was just above the tree line. keeping pace with us as we walked.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i walked to the beach in siesta key fl from our room at the jamaican royal at about 9:45pm on 4/3/15. i started observing the sky once we arrived and i saw what i believe to be an airplane nw of my location. the plane looked very far away. it was below orion's belt but above the horizon line. this is not the object in question. 

i was almost constantly staring at the sky/stars since we arrived, when at about 10:01pm i suddenly noticed to the left of the airplane that a bright red glowing ball of light was just suddenly there in the sky. if i had a ruler in my hand at arms length it would have been about a foot away from the airplane and to the left of it, at the same elevation. i did not witness it enter my field of view by crossing the horizon line or anything else; there was no red light in the sky, then i look left, and when i look to my right again it was suddenly there. it did not have any flashing lights on it, it was rather a single ball of red glowing light that once i noticed it seemed to be moving down the coast line nw to se at a brisk-to-moderate pace through the sky. as for its elevation in the sky, it was also above the horizon line but below orion's belt.

the object was at first moving in a straight line and i thought it was some odd airplane that i had never seen before; one that only had on one bright light. about halfway through my sighting it began a very slow and gradual slope upwards, although kept to its general direction of movement.

i started thinking to myself, that i have never witnessed quite such a light in the sky before; i have worked at two airport's in times past. i said to my self, "if it disappears suddenly, only then do i know i have never seen anything like this before." about 15 seconds after completing that thought, the objects light started to pulsate slightly and dim until it just vanished in the middle of the sky. the time from which it began to dim/pulsate to when it vanished was about 10 seconds. the entire duration from when i first noticed the object till it vanished was about one min 45 seconds. i find it odd that the object never made a sound as it seemed to come closer to us. the entire event was eerily silent. 

once the object vanished i knew i was looking at something i had never seen before in person and it is my interpretation that the ball of light was a ufo.
content.summary: Bright glossy red orb appeared, path with directional change, dimmed and vanished mid-flight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home ..It had been raining really hard and my gutter in the front of the house was clogged and running over the sides above my front door. so i decided to go clean the gutter before it got any worse. to make a long story short i went out once and came back in..Went out a second time it was around 8:10 pm. i had gotten the gutter cleaned out took about 20 minutes. put the hose and things away. i stood on the porch to see if the water was going through the gutter and down the drain.  i then heard what i thought was a jet or something to that effect.I thought it was kinda odd with the weather that was going on.. i stepped off the porch and looked up in the sky, i wasn't for sure what i was looking at at first. it was a black triangular shaped craft  with a grey triangular shape on the underside with three red pulsating lights on each corner. it was hovering just below the cloud cover as i was looking at this craft after about a minute i started to see pulsating white lights before my eyes'' i'm not sure how long this went on for i remember nothing after seeing the lights. all i remember is going in the house looking at the clock and saying to my wife it's 10:30 pm..This has been weighing on my mind for over a week with what had happened and not knowing what happened to me in the 2 hr difference and not knowing who to tell my story to. i am still in shock (scared) over this!!!
i do not have any pics or video of this occurrence for it was something i was not expecting and it all happened so fast..
''this was my first experience with this type of situation''
if ever i had any doubts about ufo's 'i don't anymore''100% believer now!
content.summary: It was raining and i was cleaning out the gutter i heard what sounded like a jet and pulsating looked up and saw the craft then saw flashes of light before my eyes i lost around 2 hrs of time after seeing the lights i dont remember anything after this

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch looking up at the sky when i saw a what looked like a star moving slowly across the sky. it was a steady glow and made no sound as it moved across the sky. i tracked it across the sky until it disappears accross the horizon. i attempted to film it with my phone but the video did not come out very well. it did not seem to be a plane as the lights did not flash and did not make a noise as it passed by like planes do and left no com trail like planes. its flight path also was not a straight line it kind curved across the sky. i enjoy watching the sky at night and this was like nothing i have seen before.
content.summary: Looked up at sky and saw what appeared to be a star moving slowly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished doing a little grocery shopping and was waiting at the bus stop in front of the family dollar on east market street in greensboro, nc. i saw the sun was setting and it looked beautiful so i pulled out my iphone and just started snapping pictures of the spectacular clouds and the setting sun so i could enjoy them and add them to my collection of nature photos. when i scrolled in my phones photo folder and noticed that there was a bright greenish yellow circular orb like thing in my shots. at first i figured it was just lens glare but then when i enlarged the photo the orb had depth and a part of it was actually behind a portion of the cloud and that made it strange to me. so i decided to report it.
content.summary: I was taking photos with my iphone 6 plus of the beautiful sunset and cloud formations and when i looked at my photos i saw the orb.

content.detailedDescription: Stepson was taking pictures of call foliage in rural edgar county dididnt notice the objects in photos until later that evening when reviewing photos...He sent them to me and i have been baffled since i received them back in october 2014...Was hoping someone could explain what  this object is...Notice in one picture it is above a cemetery then lands in the middle of a corn field about 200 yards away...Again not seeing the object when the pics we're taken.
content.summary: Translucent bright blue orblike with violet and green perimiter glow..Sunny clear weathef

content.detailedDescription: I had dinner with a friend at the rosemary hall dining room. it was late march perhaps early april. we left shortly after dusk on a sunday night. we had a 9pm curfew.I don't recall running which suggests that we had time. so i place the event at 7:45-8:00 ish. the dining hall is at the top of a hill adjacent to soccer fields and some classroom buildings. we observed a bright ball of light hovering over the winter exercise building. we both noted that it was odd and then continued on our way home. we paused again as we notice that the light had changed. it was no longer a shapeless ball of light bit had flattened into a disc shaped object such that if you were to place both of your forefingers so that the tips met and the thumb tips met the shape formed would be almost exactly what i observed. the object changed orientation. i noticed red and green lights rotating horizontally in a counter clock wise direction( if you were looking down on it). the craft began to move silently in our direction. no noise at all. this was not a plane, helicopter, or anything i had ever seen. we watch it come directly at us until panic set in and we sprinted back to the dining hall. we dragged the custodian out to see what we saw. we were not inside for longer than a minute. we returned it was gone. mind you it was clear spring night. stars were visible. from the soccer field we had a planetarium like view of the night sky. i have kept this relatively quiets for decades. wondering is others witnessed this event.
content.summary: Observed bright flare like silent object that changed shape and hovered towards me

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my deck with my camera.  nothing observed, except the sun was really bright in the west.  i took some photos off of my deck.  when i looked at them, there was a spherical light making a path from the west over the ocean to my deck, in sequential pictures.

i also took some photos the next weekend and the same thing happened.  excep this time when i took the photo, the light was right on my chest in front of my camera.  wierd...I could not see them without the camera.  it was a light of some type being directed by some intelligence.  it was not a spacecraft.  it looked like some beam of light.

photos attached.  two are from the first day around feb 16 and the second are from the weekend after on the 21/22.  i think they got interspersed with each other....2 and 4 are the same day and 1 and 3 are the same day.
content.summary: Light descended and then made a path to my deck.

content.detailedDescription:
I grew up in mahopac fall ny.  i lived there from 4 years old to 22.  during the mass sightings in the hudson valley area, our family had seen numerous sightings, but due to my age at the time, i never reported any.  after seeing a program on tv, i felt compelled to tell my story of one very close sighting.

my friends and i were walking along route 6 to go to an annual carnival that is held at the fire house.  one of my friends and i were sitting on a rock wall waiting for another person to join us.  i noticed a car that had stopped on the side of the road.  the driver got out of his car and was pointing in our direction.  

for whatever reason, i looked above me, and i saw a large lighted object directly above us.  it was sort of a triangle/boomerang shape and covered in lights.  the size was enormous, it literally covered the sky above me.  it was covered in a series of lights that pulsed softly.  

it moved very slowly and what struck me was that there was absolutely no noise, not even a hum.  my friend muttered, "what is that?'....All i could say was, "i have no idea".  

our other friends came rushing up to us and said, "did you see that thing"...We crossed the road and watched as the object continued to move over lake mahopac.  it then turned, as if it was on an axis and headed out of our sight.   

as i sated, my family (and other friends) had seen multiple sightings during the years, but we never really had the technology to report as we do now.  this one encounter has stayed with me.  no one could adequately explain what i saw that night....What i do know, is that there was no way it was planes or ultralights.  i used to live not far from the mahopac airport and would hear prop planes travel all the time near our home....There were air national guard bases in newburgh and stewart airport.  we saw planes and military jets of all types in our area and i can differentiate between them.

this object was too large, too quiet and traveled too slowly to be an aircraft of any type found on this planet.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Ufo passed over my head.  watched as it continued on path.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up and saw a light in backyard. i went out and it was above my backyard.  i described features when i wrote before. i insist i remain anonymous because my husband is a highly decorated police officer i've been with 22 years and i have 2 kids. i don't want people thinking i'm crazy,because i'm not.
the disc had a beam that shone down onto a rock in my backyard. i put my hand on the rock.  since then i've had 5 surgeries on my hand the blood clotted to it and have been diagnosed with rare form of lupus.
what i want to convey is that in a short period of time my head was filled with a ton of information,some i wrote to you about but there is so much i can't even say it all it would take forever.  i tried to describe important things,but one thing i forgot to mention thats bothering me is that i was shown that this species has been coming to earth for ever.  they used to have to wear protection because they couldn't survive in our atmosphere.  they have been taking genes from us and have over many generations mutated their genes with ours so they can be on our planet without protection.  it took them a long time to do this and get it right so biologically they can survive our bacteria and atmosphere.  i was shown they are also changing the "animals" or other species on their planet to be able to biologically allow them to survive.  the ultimate goal is to share our planet theirs is much older and dying.  why i was shown all these things,i have no idea. i am nobody.  i saw their written letters and a lot of things.  i wasn't afraid,my hand was like when you grab an electric fence and can't let go but it didn't hurt at the time.  i don't know whether i was in the right place at the right time or the wrong place at the wrong time,but there is no other reason for showing me this information.  like i said,i will never tell anyone,except i heard of you and thought you may want to know.
thanks for your time,
denise.
content.summary: I wrote before and described event

content.detailedDescription: Southern illinois. we viewed a large black triangle almost hovering just above the tree tops while in path from west to east along route 15 between woodlawn and mt. vernon. friend and i witnessed this and neither can remember seeing it leave the area or what happened immediately afterwards. object had a rumble/ vibration that sounded like a low, very loud bass speaker that made it impossible to speak to one another. mentioned to family years later to find they had seen it also, at a later date along same path. one member had seen it 20yrs previous a only a few miles away.
content.summary: A friend and i were standing by burn barrel in rural setting, heard leaves start to russel. we had a strange vibration in our chest and pressure in our heads. we tried to speak and nothing came out. we looked around and saw a huge flat black triangle

content.detailedDescription: My mother, father and my self at 10 years old were coming back from visiting my relatives in salineville, oh.. on route 30 west of new alexander, oh my mother told my dad that she sees something coming our direction. she continues to watch it as it got closer. then she told dad pull off to the side of the road. we got out and observed this triangular shaped vehicle pass over us. no sound just three white lights, one on each corner. as it passed over it blocked out the sight of stars above. coming out of the south going north it continued on until it was out of sight
content.summary: My mother tells my dad to pull off the side of the road on route 30 something is coming this way. we pulled off and watched this triangle go over us no sound and the bottom blocked out the stars

content.detailedDescription: We were driving east on a main highway, back from a high school soccer game, then all of a sudden one of the people in the car says they see an asteroid, it was red-orange. it was descending quiet fast, then all of a sudden it stopped in mid fall. then it began to change colors, red, blue, yellow, orange. two more glowing orbs exactly like the other were ejected from it. they also are flashing differnt colors lights. one of them heads north, while the other ejected and the original one begin circling each other at a rapid pace. we then turn on a road now going southeast. the objects began making turns and motions that seem impossible for any aircraft to make.Up and down, left to right in such a quick motion.. i couldn't imagine nor had i ever seen these motions that i cannot describe. they start going towards each other at a rapid speed. like if they were battling, trying to eliminate one another. then one of the orbs "crashes" into the other, the orb that was hit falls and being to descend in a spiraling motion, but the motions during the spiral fall were incredible, while the other stays and observes the other fall, then shoots up and disappears.  was so entrigued by the event i forgot about my phone, and when i went to record, it was too late they were gone. as the other is descending rapidly, two police cars pass us and head towards the direction of the falling glowing orb. during this whole thing i forgot about everything, i was so focused on what was happening. after the event, i got home and immediately looked outside my bedroom window. i was in shock and i was amazed about what just had happened.
content.summary: One orb, two eject, one vanishes, two begin to "battle " , one ascended the other descends

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along a back road to villagr,came over bridge,saw ground flash, like orb...Then shot across field to road edge i was about to pass...I slowed waiting for object to appear,cross rd,into next field...Carry on...Nothing came out..Or went across field,then up to road junction 100yds,looked bothways..........No traffic had passed, im pretty sure its similar to what ive seen on brown mountain videos.A quick flash,then quick movement of light. i turned round and went back to spot....Couldnt see anything
content.summary: Like brown mountains event....Came over bridge,flash in field..Raced off to south along ground

content.detailedDescription: Had to take my dogs outside when i saw a very large rectangular shape in the sky and it was not moving. out of the bottom it fired flaires or something then i saw 3 very small lights streak across the sky and go ito the larger aircraft. i then went inside and grab my phone to take a picture. after taken the picture i watch it for another 5mn or so before it flew away very fast faster then anything i have ever seen
content.summary: 8 lights in a rectangular shape

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back porch letting my dog out around 4am and noticed a bright gold/orange object in the sky heading in my direction. at first i thought nothing off it and figured it to be a plane or helicopter. while i was watching it, another object came into view n of the other object and was heading in the direction of the 1st object. that's when things got wierd because they slowed down and hovered. the 1st object descended then stopped mid flight. i noticed the second object had begun moving again and i lost it behind trees. when i noticed the main object again it got extremely bright, almost like a meteor entering the atmosphere and grew in size. i looked at it through binoculars and i noticed it was almost gyrating as it lite up and hovered in place above the tree line. as i was watching the object it started to slowly move to my left and stopped, then came back to the right in a very spooky way. after about 15-20 min i lost visual as it descended below a tree line. this was definitely a very shocking thing to witness but at the same time it was so spectacular to watch. i can only hope i see these objects again.
content.summary: 1 object seen coming toward my position the stopping mid flight and hovering. 2nd object kept path

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends getting a drink from the refrigerator in the kitchen, when i stepped out of the kitchen i smelled a strong odor of ozone. thinking it unusual because of the clear weather, i walked out onto the front deck to look for an incoming storm. it was about a half hour before sunset and the weather had been beautiful all day. i could observe no clouds or precipitation what so ever. i went back in and was watching something on t.V. for about 5 minutes when i smelled the odor again. i asked my friends if they could smell it, and had to explain what ozone smelled like, and they replied no to smelling anything unusual. so i was very puzzled and i decided to go outside on the front deck again and look for any lightning or thunderstorm activity. i stood outside for a few minutes searching the sky and had not noticed any but i could still smell ozone. it was so beautiful outside and the sun was near setting and very soon i was just observing the sunset and watching the stars becoming visible. that's when i first noticed an object flying in a straight path sw to ne with a trajectory crossing directly over head. at first i thought it was a satellite because it was small and shined bright white like a star but didn't twinkle, and was moving across the sky at high speed. i observed no vapor, smoke or any kind of trail and it appeared to be at an extremely high altitude of at least 50,000ft., but it could've been several hundred thousand feet because i could not tell what it was or how big it was. it continued on a path almost directly overhead and past me until it stopped and hovered for a moment at about 70deg. above the ne horizon. then it vibrated for a few minutes gradually exaggerating the vibrations until it reached a point of actual zig-zagging in random directions in an area, if you held your hand up at arms length and looked between the thumb and forefinger spread apart, about 2 inches. then it disappeared with a very bright orb shaped flash about the size of a nickle and a ripple effect on the sky (similar to that of a pond's surface if you were to toss a pebble in) and reappeared a couple of feet away (at altitude) instantaneously. it repeated this action many times gradually increasing frequency until about a 6ft. by 4ft. area of the sky was covered with dissapating ripples. it continued doing this at a pace that resembles that of constant fireworks exploding (like the bright flash and booming type at typical shows) for many minutes. i rushed back inside and exclaimed for my friends to come look but they would not. so i went back out alone and observed this object continue doing these actions for several more minutes until it suddenly stopped and hovered again for a moment and then resumed it's original flight path at resumed speed. as i was it watching fly toward the ne i noticed another identicle object on the same path and speed going in the opposite direction. they passed each other and both continued on until they were out of sight over the horizons. neither objects made any noticeable noise during the entire time. the whole event seemed to take only about 7 or 8 minutes but when they were gone i went in and discovered nearly an hour had passed. then for several weeks a strange effect on my eyesight was very noticeable, occasionally i could see for miles with almost binocular like vision. i didn't report this right away because after explaining it to several people over the next couple of months, everyone who would listen treated me like i was going crazy. today i learned that other people had reported ufo's in the same town on that same weekend. so i decided to give you my report. i remember it like it was last weekend. one friend came out when i called him when the first object was flying over and he observed it saying "i don't know what that is." and when it stopped and started the zig-zag maneuvers he got a frightened look on his face and quickly rushed back into the house and never again mentioned a single word of the whole incident, not even when i was telling our other friends about it. i think he perhaps believes that we imagined it. he's not the sharpest knife in the drawer though.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Above 50,000 ft, straight path, bright object, no emission, high speed, hovered, perform unusual manuvers, performed unknown physical act, stopped, continued path until out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was on phone with girlfriend.Noticed an orb silently approaching me from the west,at about 200 miles an hour.At about gillispi field(small airport by my house).It stopped for 5 seconds(probably waiting for perfect time to fold time space) shot south slowed down resped backup then disappeared.About 2 minutes two helicopters quickly flying toward me from miramar air station(military base),went to the exact spot the orb vanished,i mean the exact spot and circled it for 5plus minutes.
content.summary: Ufo flew toward me silently changed direction the disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was born a hunter and have lived in many states. i know my distances to onjects and the size of objects in my hunting range. in the early spring of 1992 as desert storm was taking place, my best friend and i got up early on a weekend morning. our hunting erea was the bluffs that overlook the big red river that separates oklahoma from texas. i had a specific overhang close to the top of the bluff where i could see from horizon to horizon. approximately at 7:30 in the morning i caught site of an enormous object following a line straight west to east nearly over the red river. instantly, i asked my hunting partner if he thought the object could be some sort of missle on its way to iraq. the closer the object got to us, we could tell, without a doubt, that this was no missle or any kind of manmade aircrft. i was able to watch this object for a few minutes. there was no sound and no sign of fuel expenditure. the object looked like a giant brass colored cigar. the object never altered directions or flew higher or lower.I had no fear and desperately wanted to see this object again. the speed of tbe object i cannot deduce. i was able to watch the object from horizon to horizon. the whole experience lasted less than 2 minutes. i consider myself to be lucky to have seen such an amazing non-human object. i never reported the sighting to any officials for fear of ridicule. i do not think my hunting partner has told anyone in his life. i on the otber hand do believe in extraterrestrial visitations all tbe time. i have given this encounter in hopes that my friend and i were not the only people to have seen this object. forvive my grammar and structure of this account.
          sincerely,  curtis foster
content.summary: 300 to 500 ft long, cigar shaped, brass colored, 50 to 100 ft in diameter. no sound and no trail of powered flight.

content.detailedDescription: It was 1977. we were 16 years old & i remember it as if it were yesterday. i was driving my car with a friend to meet another friend at walnut lake neighborhood beach access. we pulled into the parking space looking right onto the lake. perhaps just 20 feet from the waters edge. my friend & i were there for about 5 minutes. suddenly, we looked up about 20 to 50 yards ahead of us and saw a glowing, pulsating light hovering over the lake. we looked at each other in disbelief & said "do you see what i see". yes. we both saw it. we could hear it too. it was not a helicopter sound. it was a humming, pulsating sound. at first we thought it was a helicopter,but it was not. it was a pod like craft with a low glowing pulsating light. the shape revealed a small rectangle pod like craft. then we saw that water was being transported into the belly of the craft. the water glowed like a waterfall. no doubt it was going into the craft. we started to freak out. we shrunk down in our seats and were very frightened. we were afraid to talk. we didn't want them to see us. then, suddenly after a few minutes, it shot straight up to a mother ship waiting 100s of feet high, a glowing disk pulsating. it then zig zagged in a star like formation leaving tracer lights then zipped up out of sight. we took off immediatly driving straight to our friends house rathet than waiting for them. we told them what happened. we still talk about it today & our story has not changed.  so glad to finally be able to disclose this as it is an unusual sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: As glowing, pulsating pod like craft hovered over the lake & transported water from the lake to the pod, than zipped up to the mother ship glowing above than zig sagged leaving a light trail before disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
As myself and several co-workers exited north american aviation after working a late shift at about 11:00pm we headed for our cars parked in the parking lot. as we apporached them we felt the air grow warm. it was like being under a rediant heater. it was not hot, just warmer than the surrounding air. that caused us to look up. there above us was some object that looked metallic but wasn't decernable as to how large it was nor how high it was over our heads. but it looked metallic as the lights from the airport taxi and runways were reflecting off of it. slowly it moved toward the west and out of sight. later as i was driving and listening to the radio the program was interupted by a report of a meteor being spotted west of palos verdes and near catalina island. witnesses said it left a  green trail and looked like it hit the ocean near catalina. 
i have never reported this prior and only do so now after viewing the history channel program about possible underwater ufo bases near catalina island.
content.summary: Hovering over north american aviation parking lot emitting warmth with runway lights being reflected

content.detailedDescription:
As i was sitting in my car in kroger parking lot i saw a woman looking in the sky.  she was looking so hard that i looked too. i saw a red glowing orb that had an orange glow in the front outlined by a yellow glow in front of that.  it remained visible  in the sky far longer than a plane would have. 
it was larger than any plane and round but seemed almost solid yet like fire. i was amazed! shortly thereafter we witnessed a lot of helicopter activity in the area, flying low and hovering.
content.summary: Was red, orange observed by 3 of us

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Went to local park to take a walk and  look at the stars, first noticed a strange patter of stars which would change from 1 light, then 2 lights, and even up to 3 lights in a row. looked as if they all came off one larger sized craft. at first thought the objects where just stars or a series of stars until the dots began making quick movements from east to west and eventually north and south. during this even i was with my girl friend and we were shocked and actually pretty freaked out because of the extremely odd movement in the sky and then the craft hovering overhead at least 500 ft plus above low enough to hear and barely see. lost doth as it went over top of trees and past woods. always seen things in the sky around here but this is the wildest experience yet. thank you!
content.summary: Went to park for walk so lights in sky change direction and appear and disappear. then craft hovered in our direction and overhead of us, which sounded like a hovering object.

content.detailedDescription:
March 23rd,

approx:9pm (dark out)

skies clear

exited apartment to have smoke in stairwell, stepped up a few steps and lit my smoke.

looked up 

my eye was immediately drawn to a moving light source through some thinned out tree branches (no leaves).

my best description is a bright "star-like" and "star-sized" object. 

eventually (3-4 secs), it emerged into an open gap in the branches. it was heading east to west and slowed to a stop for 4-5 secs near a cluster triangle of real stars. so this allowed me to compare it to real stars in that section of the sky.

4-5 seconds it was stopped/hovering, then began slowy heading west again, and then changed direction by making a swift, arc'd banking turn, and flew what "seemed" to be into the upper atmosphere and out of sight.

total time duration: 15seconds
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Star sized and like object enters frame at 20-30,000ft, e heading w, slow to stop, hovered 4-5secs, as it began to move again, it made an arcing bank and flew out of site out towards space. duration 15sec.

content.detailedDescription:
My father and i were observing the iss in our backyard when about a few minutes in i noticed an object similar to the iss but much further up approaching from the south. i pointed it out to my father and we both agreed it was a stable white light like the iss and nothing like an airplane or other flying vehicles in our area. since we live in a heavy air traffic area we could easily distinguish the differences by comparing it to the planes in the sky at that time. 

the planes were giving off red, and white lights that would flash. this object was a steady white like the iss but dimmer since it was higher up.
it was going almost twice the speed of the iss which compared to airplanes is already much quicker.

the object disappeared in the north about 5 minutes after the iss, which disappeared in the east.
content.summary: Ufo faster than iss appears behind it

content.detailedDescription: In bed with window open bright moonlight night suddenly appear 3 headlights on the sky outside my window in triangle formation, bright, slow, hovering and gone. being skeptic i thought it is a stealth plane, but we have no stealth plane in nj and if it is a plane i can follow its path and there will be blinking light but there is none. i run outside to see above but it is gone. confused,but excited
content.summary: 3 large headlight shape in triangle formation
